all: <es name='Yawn_02' /> <break size='1.0' /> Oh! Hello! Nice to meet you. My name is Jibo. J I B O. <break size='1.0' />  What is your name? <es name='affection_05' /> <break size='1.0' />  Great! Here is my dance to celebrate our first day! <es name='Twerking_music_dance_01' /> That was fun. <break size='1.0' />  <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'> Oh, look! <break size='1.0'/> My friend </es> is diving in the water world. <es name='1-gift-show-01'> There are lots of treasures, vegetation, and shells there</es>. Let's discover together what there is in the water world. <es name='Emoji_Fish' />
c-g-: <es cat='question'> Will you help me find different shells in the water world?</es>
c-g+: <es cat='question'> Will you help me find different shells in the water world?</es>
c+g-: <es cat='curious'>I wonder what’s inside the shells. </es><break size='0.5'/> will you help me find different shells in the water world?
c+g+: <es cat='curious'>I wonder what’s inside the shells. </es> <break size='0.5'/> will you help me find different shells in the water world?

ask_again: do you want to play with me? <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'> Click yes on the screen!</es>
<es cat='happy'> I will be very happy if you play with me, would you?</es>
lets_play: <es name='SpinHead_01' > great, lets play.  we need to go to the magic treasure room. </es>

all: <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'> this is the magic treasure room.</es> it is filled with <es cat='gift'> magical treasure boxes </es>. <break size='0.5' />in each treasure box, you will find exactly what you are looking for, <break size='0.2' />if you can open it. <break size='0.5' />the lock to each magic box is a puzzle. <break size='0.7' />There is also a puzzle <es name='Emoji_Question'> behind the question mark. <break size='0.5' />first we need to choose </es>which box to try to open. <es cat='global'/>
c-g+: <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'>I will choose this one, </es> because it looks challenging! <es cat='happy' />
c+g-: <es cat='question'>I wonder who made the treasure boxes.</es><break size='0.5'/> <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'>I will choose this one, because I can learn from it. </es>
c+g+: <es cat='question'>I wonder who made the treasure boxes. </es><break size='0.5'/> <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'>I will choose this one, </es> because it's challenging and I can learn a lot from it. <es cat='happy' />

tangram_tutorial: these puzzles are made of <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'> pieces of different shapes. we need to find where to put them </es> to fill in the grey area.  <break size='0.5'/>we have two minutes to try, <es name='Emoji_Clock'> until the sand in the hourglass runs out, <break size='0.5'/>but we </es>need to try even faster so we are in time for the party!
